alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 27 at 2:29AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Chilton, Hale and Perry. * WHEN...Until 630 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 229 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Calera, Clanton, Brent, Centreville, Jemison, Greensboro, Thorsby, West Centreville, Heiberger, Talladega National Forest, Mertz, Lawley, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Greensboro Municipal Airport, Gap Of The Mountain, Sawyerville, Wedgeworth and Lay Lake.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
